name: 4TOOL.ai
description: 4TOOL is the ultimate Web3 launchpad—an AI-powered, multi-chain trading and SocialFi platform built to bridge Web2 users into Web3 with ease. We’re simplifying Web3 onboarding while delivering institutional-grade AI trading tools for both beginners and pros. 4TOOL integrates top-tier services like BirdEye, Arkham, Dexscreener, TradingView, YouTube, Telegram, CoinGecko, and Kaito—all accessible from a single, intuitive dashboard.
